message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I believe it's worth a significant amount, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with an offer of $2000000. I think this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value and rarity.
